import { faMinus, faPlus } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import React from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import { numberWithCommas } from "../utils/utils"; const ModalKeranjang = ({ showModal, handleClose, keranjangDetail, jumlah, keterangan, }) => { if (keranjangDetail) { return ( {keranjangDetail.product.nama}{" "} (Rp. {numberWithCommas(keranjangDetail.product.harga)})
Total Harga :

Rp. {numberWithCommas(keranjangDetail.product.harga)}

Jumlah :
{jumlah} Keterangan :
); } else { return ( Kosong Keranjang Kosong ); } }; export default ModalKeranjang;
